languages.text: "Я, значит, схватил пилу ржавую и давай его кромсать. А потом... кинжалом из кости девственницы пырнул! А, ну, и сглазил сначала. Куда же без сглаза!"
"Well, I grabbed myself a rusty saw and started hacking at him. Then... I pulled out a dagger made from a virgin's bones and stabbed him! Oh, right, I also cursed him first. It was only right."
languages.original_text: "Я, значит, схватил пилу ржавую и давай его кромсать. А потом... кинжалом из кости девственницы пырнул! А, ну, и сглазил сначала. Куда же без сглаза!"

"Well, I grabbed myself a rusty saw and started hacking at him. Then... I pulled out a dagger made from a virgin's bones and stabbed him! Oh, right, I also cursed him first. It was only right."

languages.text: « J'ai commencé par l'attaquer à coups de scie rouillée, et ensuite... je l'ai poignardé avec une dague en os de vierge ! Oh, et puis, je lui ai aussi jeté une malédiction. Il a eu ce qu'il méritait. »
languages.original_text: "Well, I grabbed myself a rusty saw and started hacking at him. Then... I pulled out a dagger made from a virgin's bones and stabbed him! Oh, right, I also cursed him first. It was only right."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai commencé par l'attaquer à coups de scie rouillée, et ensuite... je l'ai poignardé avec une dague en os de vierge ! Oh, et puis, je lui ai aussi jeté une malédiction. Il a eu ce qu'il méritait. »

languages.text: «Bueno, agarré una sierra oxidada y empecé a rebanarlo. Y después... ¡saqué una daga hecha con los huesos de una virgen y lo apuñalé! Aunque primero lo maldije, claro. Es lo correcto».
languages.original_text: "Well, I grabbed myself a rusty saw and started hacking at him. Then... I pulled out a dagger made from a virgin's bones and stabbed him! Oh, right, I also cursed him first. It was only right."

traits.locale_text: «Bueno, agarré una sierra oxidada y empecé a rebanarlo. Y después... ¡saqué una daga hecha con los huesos de una virgen y lo apuñalé! Aunque primero lo maldije, claro. Es lo correcto».

languages.text: “呃，我抄起一把生了锈的锯子，拼命砍他。然后……我掏出一把用处女的骨头做成的匕首，刺了他几刀！没错，在这之前，我还诅咒了他，就是这样。”
languages.original_text: "Well, I grabbed myself a rusty saw and started hacking at him. Then... I pulled out a dagger made from a virgin's bones and stabbed him! Oh, right, I also cursed him first. It was only right."

traits.locale_text: “呃，我抄起一把生了锈的锯子，拼命砍他。然后……我掏出一把用处女的骨头做成的匕首，刺了他几刀！没错，在这之前，我还诅咒了他，就是这样。”

languages.text: 「錆びたノコギリを持ち、彼を切り刻み始めたんだ。それから…処女の骨でできた短剣を抜いて、彼を刺したんだ！そうそう、最初に彼を呪ったよ。当然のことだ」
languages.original_text: "Well, I grabbed myself a rusty saw and started hacking at him. Then... I pulled out a dagger made from a virgin's bones and stabbed him! Oh, right, I also cursed him first. It was only right."

traits.locale_text: 「錆びたノコギリを持ち、彼を切り刻み始めたんだ。それから…処女の骨でできた短剣を抜いて、彼を刺したんだ！そうそう、最初に彼を呪ったよ。当然のことだ」

languages.text: "Nun, ich habe mir eine rostige Säge geschnappt und ihn damit ein wenig bearbeitet. Dann ... habe ich einen Dolch aus den Knochen einer Jungfrau hervorgeholt und auf ihn eingestochen! Ach ja, und davor habe ich ihn noch verflucht. Das hatte er verdient."
languages.original_text: "Well, I grabbed myself a rusty saw and started hacking at him. Then... I pulled out a dagger made from a virgin's bones and stabbed him! Oh, right, I also cursed him first. It was only right."

traits.locale_text: "Nun, ich habe mir eine rostige Säge geschnappt und ihn damit ein wenig bearbeitet. Dann ... habe ich einen Dolch aus den Knochen einer Jungfrau hervorgeholt und auf ihn eingestochen! Ach ja, und davor habe ich ihn noch verflucht. Das hatte er verdient."

languages.text: "İşte, elime paslı bir testere geçirip onu doğramaya başladım. Sonra... Bakire kemiklerinden yapılma bir hançer çıkarıp onu bıçakladım! Ha bir de önce onu lanetledim. Hak etmişti."
languages.original_text: "Well, I grabbed myself a rusty saw and started hacking at him. Then... I pulled out a dagger made from a virgin's bones and stabbed him! Oh, right, I also cursed him first. It was only right."
